content: ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ special offer alert add any pattern to your cart to unlock the exclusive discounted price don t miss this sale ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ give your holiday decorating a cozy upgrade with the **wheat stitch™ crochet stocking** designed with ***my signature wheat stitch texture*** 1 and worked neatly from the toe up for a polished seamless finish this festive crochet stocking pattern is perfect for creating handmade christmas décor gift-giving or adding a timeless touch to your mantel after you create the toe you ll work the foot in joined and turned rounds leaving an opening for the heel we ll loop back to that later once the foot is complete you ll continue the stocking body in wheat stitch rounds until it reaches that classic elegant height your stocking will be finished with a clean stretchy ribbed cuff then you ll add a hanging tab to display it with pride personalize it with festive touches such as tassels pom-poms or tiny bells to make it uniquely yours this pattern offers a beautiful textured look while remaining fun and approachable for both confident beginners and experienced crocheters create one as a thoughtful handmade gift or stitch a whole matching set for the family a video tutorial is included in the pattern 2 **crochet hook ** g+/7 4 5mm - or size to meet gauge 3 **notions ** removable stitch markers 4 yarn needle to weave in ends 5 scissors 6 rivets 7 burlap ribbon 8 or leather fabric 9 wooden tags 10 **yarn ** herrschners worsted 8 sparkle 11 92% acrylic/8% polyester 489ds/226g brava tweed 12 100% premium acrylic 218yds/100g **yarn quantities ** solid color 230 yds 2 colors yardage will depend on personal preference **yarn substitutions ** brava worsted 13 - 100% premium acrylic 218yds/100g mighty stitch worsted 14 - 80% acrylic 20% superwash wool 208yds/100g mary maxim starlette sparkle 15 - 198% acrylic 2% polyester 196yds/100g herrschners worsted 8 heathers 16 - 100% acrylic 489yds/226g malabrigo rios 17 - 100% superwash merino wool 210yds/100g lion brand heartland 18 - 100% acrylic 251yds/142g **abbreviations ** blo- back loop only chain - chain half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet hdc2tog - half_double_crochet 2 together rs - right side single_crochet - single_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch st s - stitch es ws - wrong side **gauge ** 15 sts and 13 row = 4 by 4 in stitch pattern repeat not blocked not sure what gauge is check out this blog post what is crochet gauge and how to fix it 19 **sizes ** one size 16 x 6 5 **skill level ** advanced beginner **let s be friends on social media ** website http //www brianakdesigns com/ 20 instagram https //www instagram com/brianakdesigns/ 21 facebook https //www facebook com/brianakdesigns/ 22 community group https //www facebook com/groups/brianak/ 23 pinterest https //www pinterest com/brianakdesigns/boards/ 24 youtube https //www youtube com/channel/ucvqxin8ot3ndwb40iamipsw 25 when sharing projects on social media i love to see them please use #brianakdesigns it is much appreciated and loved © 2025 designed by briana kepner briana
